resources.string: Enter any thoughts, feelings or a description of your mood during this event.
Enter your motivational messages below to see them on your page.
To consent, type \"I consent to this\" in this text input.
Below shows some logistics of your anxious moments, if some data appears more prominent than others,try to think about how you might go about tackling this.

This application is not a medical device. Taking part is voluntary and you can drop out at any point using the button below with no consequences. Consenting gives permission for the application to access your location and your input to be recorded. Consenting to the use of this application also confirms you have signed a consent form and agree to all the information documented.
